description: Table definitions for the ERC-20 schema. These tables can be used for any protocol.

timestamp.description: The UNIX timestamp of the block associated with the transaction.

block_number.description: The block number for the transaction

from_user_address.description: The address of the user sending the erc-20 transfer.

to_user_address.description: The address of the user receiving the erc-20 transfer.

token_transfer_amount.description: The amount of the token transferred (decimal normalized).

token_address.description: The smart contract address of the token.

token_symbol.description: The symbol of the token we are getting the balance of.

log_index.description: The event log. For transactions that don't emit event, create arbitrary index starting from 0.
